text: Oh nina enikholwayo! Yibani ngabalekeleli baMvelinqangi njengoba asho uJesu indodana kaMariya kubafundi, “ngobani abasizi bami kuMvelinqangi” abafundi bathi, “thina singabasizi baMvelinqangi” manjalo lakholwa iqembu labantwana bakwa-Israyeli futhi (elinye) iqembu langakholwa ngakho-ke sabalekelela ezitheni zabo babangabanqobi labo abakholwa”
